data.text: @amaris_g Everything I do right now seems really, really insignificant. However, good luck with the house hunt!
@amaris_g We bought a house and started new jobs (me at a new company, my wife in a new position at her college) in the past year as well.

@amaris_g Just because it's on your screen, doesn't mean you have to read it...?  Your mental health *probably* needs a break for a bit.  Go play Lego.

Good luck on the house-hunting. I hope the new job is what you were hoping for and is bringing you some peace and satisfaction.
